name: places/ChIJIxir0DxZwokREAs2fl1COas
adrFormatAddress: 1709 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Everytime I come into contact with this woman it’s always something. Today I brought my sister here to get a Brazilian wax and when we walked in we weren’t greeted which is fine that just shows you don’t have any customer service etiquette. Long story short my sister asked to get a Brazilian wax how fortunate that her card machine doesn’t work. So my sister had to walk from 89th street to 86th street to chase to withdraw money: so now 2 customers skipped my sister. Then when one of the customers were done she offered to them to pay through zelle. So I had to ask why you asked my sister to walk all the way to chase when she could’ve Zelled you as well instead of walking then she made an excuse that the amount was not worth zelle that’s why but a Brazilian wax is $50 and the lady got $80 worth of waxing. I wish Saleema was here her customer service and 2 other young ladies are phenomenal but this one here smh is the worse. I don’t recommend anyone to deal with her if you are African American you will not receive the same treatment. I’m not trying to make it a race thing but call it what you want my sister had to walk to be able to be serviced while others didn’t. Go to everyone else but her

originalText.text:
Was a frequent customer, Harshi does a great job - on today 10/20 this afternoon I went in and had someone new I’ve never seen before. Worst threading and wax experience of my life

My eyes brows look absolutely awful - I had to spend an hour when I got home fixing them - I also have burns underneath both of my eyes from how rough her threading was - to top it all off, I got a nose wax and she dripped wax all into my mustache - had to sit there for 20 minutes while she tried cleaning it out without ripping my mustache apart, when she got tired she even asked me to do it! Than rang me up full price at $15 for a nose wax - I couldn’t believe the robbery and what just occurred

STAY FAR AWAY FROM HERE - I’ll never go back

originalText.text: Do not recommend at all. I was very clear with what I wanted and needed - eyebrow wax and to be gentle because I have sensitive skin and have had skin pulled off before, she asked if I wanted threading and I said no. The woman was not gentle, she kept trying to tread and I kept saying no. She pulled out the threading string and I had to get up out of the chair. I walked out with skin pulled off. Awful.

originalText.text: I generally like this location but I will say I wouldn’t come here past 7:30pm. I walked in at 7:40pm to just get my brows done and was turned away (no other customers there) because they were “closed” despite the hours stating 8pm as closing. Frustrating when you plan around store hours and they don’t stick to them.

originalText.text: Worst brow place in the area and I've lived in the area for 20+ years. Overall lazy work and poor customer service.
